author: Fielde, John, d. 1588.
Gwalther, Rudolf, 1519-1586.
Bèze, Théodore de, 1519-1605.
T. W. (Thomas Wilcox), 1549?-1608.
notes: Drawn up by a group of puritans, but the actual writing quite possibly by John Fielde and Thomas Wilcox.
Includes letters from Rudolf Gwalther and Théodore de Bèze.
Title from caption title, A2r; A1r commences with preface "To the godly readers, grace, and peace from God. &c.".
Reproduction of the original in Yale University. Library.
keywords: Church of England. --  Controversial literature --  Anglican authors.
